meanings.sent1: The workers misbuilding the house used the wrong materials.
meanings.sent2: It is important to follow the instructions carefully to avoid misbuilding.
meanings.sent3: The misbuilding of the treehouse made it look like a crooked castle.
meanings.sent4: Her misbuilding of the sandcastle resulted in a lopsided masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The children learned the consequences of misbuilding when their tower collapsed.

meanings.definition: A building that has been constructed incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misbuilding stood out among the other structures in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The architect had to demolish the misbuilding and start from scratch.
meanings.sent3: The misbuilding resembled a puzzle with pieces in the wrong places.
meanings.sent4: The misbuilding loomed like a giant mistake in the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: Visitors couldn't help but notice the misbuilding's awkward design.
